or Chatuarii, Byvanck Excerpta I, p. 317, or Chasuarii, Stückelberger and Grasshoff 2006, p. 229

or Chatti, in Hessen, Byvanck Excerpta I, p. 317

in Westfalen, Byvanck Excerpta I, p. 317
small tribe in Holstein, here mentioned for the first time (2.11.13) and later mentioned by Eutropius IX.21 - Byvanck Excerpta I, p. 317

ur
